author: Lauren Thomas
title: Lululemon CEO: Some retailers will be able to 'weather' coronavirus pandemic. Others won't
description: Lululemon announced Thursday that it will pay all its workers through June 1, whether or not its stores reopen before then, amid the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
Lululemon announced Thursday that it will be paying all its workers through June 1, whether or not its stores reopen before then, amid the coronavirus pandemic. 
Lululemon also has paid all its April rent to landlords. A hotly debated topic in the industry h… [+3341 chars]
